definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe

sentences.english: Shanghai Theater Academy is full of southern graceful and pleasant girls.
sentences.chinese: 上海戏剧学院的美女多是南派气质，婉约可人。

sentences.english: He graduated from the Shanghai Theater Academy in Fine Arts in 1978.
sentences.chinese: 冷宏1978年毕业于上海戏剧学院。

sentences.english: Graduated from Drama. Literature Department of Shanghai Theatre Academy, State level A scriptwriter.
sentences.chinese: 上海戏剧学院戏剧文学系毕业，国家一级编剧。

sentences.english: On Mar. 22th, 2011, PlayPlay Peking Opera Workshop was held in Shanghai Peking Opera Troup.
sentences.chinese: 京剧体验课在上海戏剧学院端钧剧场成功举行。

sentences.english: He graduated from the Shanghai Drama Institute, Stage Design Department in 1988.
sentences.chinese: 1988年毕业于上海戏剧学院舞台美术系。

sentences.english: Xiong Foxi Building is now the administration building of Shanghai Theater Academy.
sentences.chinese: 如今，熊佛西楼已成为上海戏剧学院的行政楼。
